verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, Thou and thy sons <WH1121> and thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004> with thee shall bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the sanctuary <WH4720>: and thou and thy sons <WH1121> with thee shall bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of your priesthood <WH3550>.

And thy brethren <WH251> also of the tribe <WH4294> of Levi <WH3878>, the tribe <WH7626> of thy father <WH1>, bring <WH7126> thou with thee, that they may be joined <WH3867> unto thee, and minister <WH8334> unto thee: but thou and thy sons <WH1121> with thee shall minister before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of witness <WH5715>.

And they shall keep <WH8104> thy charge <WH4931>, and the charge <WH4931> of all the tabernacle <WH168>: only they shall not come nigh <WH7126> the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944> and the altar <WH4196>, that neither they, nor ye also, die <WH4191>.

And they shall be joined <WH3867> unto thee, and keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, for all the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168>: and a stranger <WH2114> shall not come nigh <WH7126> unto you.

And ye shall keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, and the charge <WH4931> of the altar <WH4196>: that there be no wrath <WH7110> any more upon the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And I, behold, I have taken <WH3947> your brethren <WH251> the Levites <WH3881> from among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: to you they are given <WH5414> as a gift <WH4979> for the LORD <WH3068>, to do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

Therefore thou and thy sons <WH1121> with thee shall keep <WH8104> your priest's office <WH3550> for every thing <WH1697> of the altar <WH4196>, and within <WH1004> the vail <WH6532>; and ye shall serve <WH5647>: I have given <WH5414> your priest's office <WH3550> unto you as a service <WH5656> of gift <WH4979>: and the stranger <WH2114> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death <WH4191>.

¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Aaron <WH175>, Behold, I also have given <WH5414> thee the charge <WH4931> of mine heave offerings <WH8641> of all the hallowed things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; unto thee have I given <WH5414> them by reason of the anointing <WH4888>, and to thy sons <WH1121>, by an ordinance <WH2706> for ever <WH5769>.

This shall be thine of the most <WH6944> holy things <WH6944>, reserved from the fire <WH784>: every oblation <WH7133> of theirs, every meat offering <WH4503> of theirs, and every sin offering <WH2403> of theirs, and every trespass offering <WH817> of theirs, which they shall render <WH7725> unto me, shall be most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> for thee and for thy sons <WH1121>.
In the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place shalt thou eat <WH398> it; every male <WH2145> shall eat <WH398> it: it shall be holy <WH6944> unto thee.

And this is thine; the heave offering <WH8641> of their gift <WH4976>, with all the wave offerings <WH8573> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: I have given <WH5414> them unto thee, and to thy sons <WH1121> and to thy daughters <WH1323> with thee, by a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769>: every one that is clean <WH2889> in thy house <WH1004> shall eat <WH398> of it.

All the best <WH2459> of the oil <WH3323>, and all the best <WH2459> of the wine <WH8492>, and of the wheat <WH1715>, the firstfruits <WH7225> of them which they shall offer <WH5414> unto the LORD <WH3068>, them have I given <WH5414> thee.

And whatsoever is first ripe <WH1061> in the land <WH776>, which they shall bring <WH935> unto the LORD <WH3068>, shall be thine; every one that is clean <WH2889> in thine house <WH1004> shall eat <WH398> of it.
Every thing devoted <WH2764> in Israel <WH3478> shall be thine.

Every thing that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358> in all flesh <WH1320>, which they bring <WH7126> unto the LORD <WH3068>, whether it be of men <WH120> or beasts <WH929>, shall be thine: nevertheless the firstborn <WH1060> of man <WH120> shalt thou surely <WH6299> redeem <WH6299>, and the firstling <WH1060> of unclean <WH2931> beasts <WH929> shalt thou redeem <WH6299>.

And those that are to be redeemed <WH6299> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> shalt thou redeem <WH6299>, according to thine estimation <WH6187>, for the money <WH3701> of five <WH2568> shekels <WH8255>, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, which is twenty <WH6242> gerahs <WH1626>.

But the firstling <WH1060> of a cow <WH7794>, or the firstling <WH1060> of a sheep <WH3775>, or the firstling <WH1060> of a goat <WH5795>, thou shalt not redeem <WH6299>; they are holy <WH6944>: thou shalt sprinkle <WH2236> their blood <WH1818> upon the altar <WH4196>, and shalt burn <WH6999> their fat <WH2459> for an offering made by fire <WH801>, for a sweet <WH5207> savour <WH7381> unto the LORD <WH3068>.
And the flesh <WH1320> of them shall be thine, as the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and as the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> are thine.

All the heave offerings <WH8641> of the holy things <WH6944>, which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> offer <WH7311> unto the LORD <WH3068>, have I given <WH5414> thee, and thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> with thee, by a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769>: it is a covenant <WH1285> of salt <WH4417> for ever <WH5769> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> unto thee and to thy seed <WH2233> with thee.

¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, Thou shalt have no inheritance <WH5157> in their land <WH776>, neither shalt thou have any part <WH2506> among <WH8432> them: I am thy part <WH2506> and thine inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And, behold, I have given <WH5414> the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> all the tenth <WH4643> in Israel <WH3478> for an inheritance <WH5159>, for <WH2500> their service <WH5656> which they serve <WH5647>, even the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

Neither must the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> henceforth <WH5750> come nigh <WH7126> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, lest they bear <WH5375> sin <WH2399>, and die <WH4191>.

But the Levites <WH3881> shall do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and they shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity <WH5771>: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755>, that among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> they have <WH5157> no inheritance <WH5159>.

But the tithes <WH4643> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which they offer <WH7311> as an heave offering <WH8641> unto the LORD <WH3068>, I have given <WH5414> to the Levites <WH3881> to inherit <WH5159>: therefore I have said <WH559> unto them, Among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> they shall have <WH5157> no inheritance <WH5159>.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Thus speak <WH1696> unto the Levites <WH3881>, and say <WH559> unto them, When ye take <WH3947> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the tithes <WH4643> which I have given <WH5414> you from them for your inheritance <WH5159>, then ye shall offer <WH7311> up an heave offering <WH8641> of it for the LORD <WH3068>, even a tenth <WH4643> part of the tithe <WH4643>.
And this your heave offering <WH8641> shall be reckoned <WH2803> unto you, as though it were the corn <WH1715> of the threshingfloor <WH1637>, and as the fulness <WH4395> of the winepress <WH3342>.

Thus ye also shall offer <WH7311> an heave offering <WH8641> unto the LORD <WH3068> of all your tithes <WH4643>, which ye receive <WH3947> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and ye shall give <WH5414> thereof the LORD's <WH3068> heave offering <WH8641> to Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>.
Out of all your gifts <WH4979> ye shall offer <WH7311> every heave offering <WH8641> of the LORD <WH3068>, of all the best <WH2459> thereof, even the hallowed part <WH4720> thereof out of it.

Therefore thou shalt say <WH559> unto them, When ye have heaved <WH7311> the best <WH2459> thereof from it, then it shall be counted <WH2803> unto the Levites <WH3881> as the increase <WH8393> of the threshingfloor <WH1637>, and as the increase <WH8393> of the winepress <WH3342>.

And ye shall eat <WH398> it in every place <WH4725>, ye and your households <WH1004>: for it is your reward <WH7939> for <WH2500> your service <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And ye shall bear <WH5375> no sin <WH2399> by reason of it, when ye have heaved <WH7311> from it the best <WH2459> of it: neither shall ye pollute <WH2490> the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, lest ye die <WH4191>.
